metadata.name: CD001 Robin Rotter
metadata.description:
CD001 Robin Rotter
Cursed Divinity is a unique and imaginative exploration into the surreal as seen through the eyes of digital artist Kevin Knight. This collection of immersive artworks captivates a dark visual perspective of divine beauty cursed to exist in a realm of darkness and evil. These exquisite works are a blend of abstract expressionism, twisted realism, and surrealism.
2048 Pixel Width
4096 Pixel Height
png Format
Year 2022
Style: Color
Name: Robin Rotter
Curse: Zombie
